ValidationRule.description: Some fields (e.g. Min KM and and Max KM) can be set in Salesforce only before vehicle is imported to COBRA, after that only admin/integration can update these information
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: /* profile name is dependant on the org default value (e.g. Systemadministrator for Danish) and so there is a risk if the language is changed in future for this validation rule to stop working, so better option is to use profile id */ $Profile.Id <> '00e5I000000pqJ7' && NOT(ISBLANK(Internal_number__c)) && OR( ISCHANGED(Min_KM__c), ISCHANGED(Max_KM__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: fields (Min KM, Max KM) can be updated only in Cobra
